{
  "type": "record",
  "name": "FlightInfo",
  "fields": [
    { "name": "flt_no",        "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "flt_type",      "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "type_aircraft", "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "air_code",      "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "src_airpt",     "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "dst_airpt",     "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "stand_no",      "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "bag_belt",      "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "gate_no",       "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "runway_no",     "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "sch_dep",       "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "est_dep",       "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "sch_arr",       "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "est_arr",       "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "chk_time",      "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "chk_cntr",      "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "running_status","type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "term_no",       "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "bag_cnt",       "type": ["null","int"], "default": null },
    { "name": "pax_cnt",       "type": ["null","int"], "default": null },
    { "name": "trns_pax",      "type": ["null","int"], "default": null },
    { "name": "trnt_pax",      "type": ["null","int"], "default": null },
    { "name": "first_bag_time","type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "last_bag_time", "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "traffic_type",  "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "start_time",    "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "end_time",      "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "tsat",          "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "asat",          "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "tobt",          "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "aobt",          "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "eldt",          "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "aldt",          "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "eibt",          "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "aibt",          "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "actual_time",   "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "schedule_time", "type": ["null","string"], "default": null }
  ]
}

    {"name": "est_arr", "type": ["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name": "running_status", "type": ["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name": "bag_cnt", "type": ["null","int"], "default": null},

{
  "type": "record",
  "name": "FlightDetails",
  "fields": [
    { "name": "flight_no", "type": "string" },
    { "name": "timestamp", "type": "long" },
    { "name": "traffic_type", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "movement_indicator", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "scheduled_time", "type": ["null", "long"], "default": null },
    { "name": "actual_time", "type": ["null", "long"], "default": null },
    { "name": "status", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "registration", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "origin", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "destination", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "airline_code", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "runway", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "aircraft_type", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "estimated_time", "type": ["null", "long"], "default": null },
    { "name": "target_off_block_time", "type": ["null", "long"], "default": null },
    { "name": "bag_count", "type": ["null", "int"], "default": null },
    { "name": "delay_code1", "type": ["null", "int"], "default": null },
    { "name": "boarding_gates", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "stand", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null }
  ]
}

properties.Script Body:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
import groovy.json.JsonOutput
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat
import java.util.Calendar
import org.apache.nifi.processor.io.StreamCallback
import java.util.UUID

flowFile = session.get()
if (!flowFile) return

def sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")

// Prepare start and end of day
def cal = Calendar.getInstance()
cal.set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, 0)
cal.set(Calendar.MINUTE, 0)
cal.set(Calendar.SECOND, 1)
cal.set(Calendar.MILLISECOND, 0)
def startOfDay = sdf.format(cal.time)

cal.set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, 23)
cal.set(Calendar.MINUTE, 59)
cal.set(Calendar.SECOND, 59)
cal.set(Calendar.MILLISECOND, 0)
def endOfDay = sdf.format(cal.time)

// Helper function to convert epoch  date string
def parseEpoch = { val ->
    if (val == null) return null
    try {
        return sdf.format(new Date(val as long))
    } catch (Exception e) {
        return null
    }
}

def nowStr = sdf.format(new Date())

flowFile = session.write(flowFile, { inputStream, outputStream ->
    def jsonText = inputStream.text
    def slurper = new JsonSlurper()
    def data = slurper.parseText(jsonText)

    // Wrap single object in list
    if (!(data instanceof List)) {
        data = [data]
    }

    def records = []

    data.each { flight ->
        // def standArrival = flight.stand.departure : null
		def standArrival = flight.stand? flight.stand.departure : null
        // def belt = flight.belt
        // def boardingGate = flight.boardingGates.departure1
		def boardingGate = flight.boardingGates? flight.boardingGates.departure1 : null

        def isDep = flight.movementIndicator?.toLowerCase() == 'departure'
        def scheduleTime = parseEpoch(flight.scheduledTime)
        def compositeKey = "${flight.id ?: UUID.randomUUID()}_${scheduleTime}_${flight.flightNo ?: ''}"

        def record = [
            flt_no        : flight.flightNo ?: null,
            flt_type      : flight.movementIndicator ?: null,
            type_aircraft : flight.aircraftType ?: null,
            air_code      : flight.airlineCode ?: null,
            src_airpt     : flight.origin ?: null,
            dst_airpt     : flight.destination ?: null,
            stand_no      : standArrival ? standArrival.slotId : null,
            bag_belt      : flight.belt ?: null,
            gate_no       : boardingGate ? boardingGate.gtd1 : null,
            runway_no     : flight.runway ?: null,
            sch_dep       : isDep ? parseEpoch(flight.scheduledTime) : null,
            est_dep       : isDep ? parseEpoch(flight.estimatedTime) : null,
            sch_arr       : null,
            est_arr       : null,
            chk_time      : flight.checkinTime ?: null,
            chk_cntr      : flight.checkinCounter ?: null,
            running_status: flight.operationalStatus ?: null,
            term_no       : flight.terminal ?: null,
            bag_cnt       : flight.bagCount ?: null,
            pax_cnt       : flight.passengerCount ?: null,
            trns_pax      : flight.transferPassenger ?: null,
            trnt_pax      : flight.transitPassenger ?: null,
            first_bag_time: parseEpoch(flight.firstBagTimestamp),
            last_bag_time : parseEpoch(flight.lastBagTimestamp),
            traffic_type  : flight.trafficType ?: null,
            start_time    : startOfDay,
            end_time      : endOfDay,
            tsat          : parseEpoch(flight.tsat),
            asat          : parseEpoch(flight.asat),
            tobt          : parseEpoch(flight.targetOffBlockTime),
            aobt          : parseEpoch(flight.actual_onblock_timestamp),
            eldt          : parseEpoch(flight.eldt),
            aldt          : parseEpoch(flight.aldt),
            eibt          : parseEpoch(flight.eibt),
            aibt          : parseEpoch(flight.aibt),
            actual_time   : parseEpoch(flight.actualTime),
            schedule_time : parseEpoch(flight.scheduledTime),
			term_no 	  : '1',
            primary_key   : compositeKey
        ]

        records << record
    }

    outputStream.write(JsonOutput.toJson(records).getBytes("UTF-8"))
} as StreamCallback)

flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, 'mime.type', 'application/json')
session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)

properties.Script Body:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
import groovy.json.JsonOutput
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat
import java.util.Calendar
import org.apache.nifi.processor.io.StreamCallback

flowFile = session.get()
if (!flowFile) return

flowFile = session.write(flowFile, new StreamCallback() {
    void process(java.io.InputStream inputStream, java.io.OutputStream outputStream) {
        def jsonText = inputStream.text
        def slurper = new JsonSlurper()
        def data = slurper.parseText(jsonText)

        // Wrap single object in a list if needed
        if (!(data instanceof List)) {
            data = [data]
        }

        def records = []
        def sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")

        // Current timestamp for crt_date/mod_date
        def nowStr = sdf.format(new Date())

        // Helper to parse epoch timestamps to formatted string
        def parseEpoch = { val ->
            if (val == null) return null
            try {
                return sdf.format(new Date(val as long))
            } catch (Exception e) {
                return null
            }
        }

        data.each { flight ->
            // def standArrival = flight.stand
			def standArrival = flight.stand? flight.stand.arrival : null
            def belt = flight.belt
            // def boardingGate = flight.boardingGates?.arrival1
			def boardingGate = flight.boardingGates? flight.boardingGates.arrival1 : null

            def isArrival = flight.movementIndicator?.toLowerCase() == 'arrival'
            def scheduleTime = parseEpoch(flight.scheduledTime)

            // Set start/end time based on movement type
            def cal = Calendar.getInstance()
            cal.set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, 0)
            cal.set(Calendar.MINUTE, 0)
            cal.set(Calendar.SECOND, isArrival ? 1 : 0)
            cal.set(Calendar.MILLISECOND, 0)
            def startOfDay = sdf.format(cal.time)

            cal.set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, 23)
            cal.set(Calendar.MINUTE, 59)
            cal.set(Calendar.SECOND, 59)
            cal.set(Calendar.MILLISECOND, 0)
            def endOfDay = sdf.format(cal.time)

            def record = [
                flt_no        : flight.flightNo ?: null,
                flt_type      : flight.movementIndicator ?: null,
                type_aircraft : flight.aircraftType ?: null,
                air_code      : flight.airlineCode ?: null,
                src_airpt     : flight.origin ?: null,
                dst_airpt     : flight.destination ?: null,
                stand_no      : standArrival?standArrival.slotId:null,
                bag_belt      : belt?belt.beltId:null,
                gate_no       : boardingGate?.gateId ?: null,
                runway_no     : flight.runway ?: null,
                sch_dep       : isArrival ? null : parseEpoch(flight.scheduledTime),
                est_dep       : isArrival ? null : parseEpoch(flight.estimatedTime),
                sch_arr       : isArrival ? parseEpoch(flight.scheduledTime) : null,
                est_arr       : isArrival ? parseEpoch(flight.estimatedTime) : null,
                chk_time      : flight.checkinTime ?: null,
                chk_cntr      : flight.checkinCounter ?: null,
                running_status: flight.operationalStatus ?: null,
                term_no       : flight.terminal ?: null,
                bag_cnt       : flight.bagCount ?: null,
                pax_cnt       : flight.passengerCount ?: null,
                trns_pax      : flight.transferPassenger ?: null,
                trnt_pax      : flight.transitPassenger ?: null,
                first_bag_time: parseEpoch(flight.firstBagTimestamp),
                last_bag_time : parseEpoch(flight.lastBagTimestamp),
                traffic_type  : flight.trafficType ?: null,
                start_time    : startOfDay,
                end_time      : endOfDay,
                tsat          : parseEpoch(flight.tsat),
                asat          : parseEpoch(flight.asat),
                tobt          : parseEpoch(flight.targetOffBlockTime),
                aobt          : parseEpoch(flight.actual_onblock_timestamp),
                eldt          : parseEpoch(flight.eldt),
                aldt          : parseEpoch(flight.aldt),
                eibt          : parseEpoch(flight.eibt),
                aibt          : parseEpoch(flight.aibt),
                actual_time   : parseEpoch(flight.actualTime),
                schedule_time : parseEpoch(flight.scheduledTime),
                term_no 	  : '1'
            ]

            records << record
        }

        outputStream.write(JsonOutput.toJson(records).getBytes("UTF-8"))
    }
})

flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, 'mime.type', 'application/json')
session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)

properties.Inactivity Message: Lacking activity as of time: ${now():format('yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss')}; flow has been inactive for ${inactivityDurationMillis:toNumber():divide(60000)} minutes
properties.Activity Restored Message: Activity restored at time: ${now():format('yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss')} after being inactive for ${inactivityDurationMillis:toNumber():divide(60000)} minutes
